testcase.classname: User Can search for Flight ticket
testcase.name: User is asked to select destination, departure, return date if leaving those fields blank
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on flight home page.......................................passed When user clicks on search flight button....................................passed Then user is presented with validation errors asking to enter flight information.passed

testcase.classname: User Can search for Flight ticket
testcase.name: User can see different airline brands after searching for a ticket
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on flight home page.......................................passed When user enters flight destination.........................................passed And user enters the date he wants to depart.................................passed And user enteres the date he wants to return................................passed And user clicks on search flight button.....................................passed Then user is show all available flight tickets and available airline brand..passed

testcase.classname: User Can search for Flight ticket
testcase.name: User can see the cheapest ticket for a certain airline brand
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on flight home page.......................................passed When user enters flight destination.........................................passed And user enters the date he wants to depart.................................passed And user enteres the date he wants to return................................passed And user clicks on search flight button.....................................passed And user select prefer airline brand........................................passed Then user can see the cheapest ticket of that airline brand.................passed
